title: Understanding Data Inventory
text: Inventorying your current data access helps you understand what data you have and what you might need. This knowledge is crucial for making informed decisions.

title: Benefits of Data Inventory
text: Knowing your data capabilities allows you to identify gaps and opportunities for improvement. It also helps in aligning your data strategy with business goals.

hintAnswer: To know your capabilities and needs
title: Choosing the Right Answer
text: Consider why understanding your current data access is important. Is it more about knowing your capabilities, justifying investments, or creating a database?
choices: To know your capabilities and needs
To create a large database for future reference
